request.description:
Display existing tracker data.

Note that this has the potential to be bulky (locations especially) and will also have to be obfuscated/censored (locations too).

response.name: Display tracker data

request.description:
The tracker needs users to fill certain details. This request help with some random fillers for people who wish to be anonymous.

Phone number must be provided later though.

Please note that suggested names are of the form "adjective"+"nigerian noun". And "adjective" might not be flattering. For example, we have seen suggestions of "Japanese", "Germinal" or even the example below!

Names are from https://github.com/stigwue/naija_pikin.

response.name: Get suggested profile (fail)
response.body: {"code":400,"message":"'meta' parameter missing or of wrong type."}

formdata.description: Look at tracker data children and provide the value of circle._id.
This is the ID of one question the user is answering (called internally "identity"). You will have several instance of this: one per question.
This is the answer of one the question the user has provided. You will have several instance of this: one per question. Note that an error will happen

User phone number. Fill fail if empty or already used. Valid format is +2348025336506.
Valid email. Okay to use the suggested non existent one.
Ignore. Used internally to track user image.
User will have an active profile created for further follow ups.
Actual address down to house number
Latitude... I'm sure you went to school.
Longitude, the other location coordinate pair. Please don't mix them up.

request.description: Submit the provided user data to the tracker so that information can be handled at the backend by CDC.
